means: 非常自负的，虚荣心强的

sentence.Network_en: Behind the words, at once self - pitying and vainglorious , the merits of the case were overwhelming.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那些既是顾影自怜而又 自命不凡 的字眼后面, 事情本身的是非曲直是无可争辩的.

sentence.Network_en: Gal.5:26 Let us not become vainglorious, provoking one another, envying one another.
sentence.Network_cn: 加五26不要贪图虚荣,彼此惹气, 互相嫉妒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年机经单词总结_蹂躏GRE_新浪博客 ... Euphoria 心情愉快症，陶醉感 Vainglorious 虚荣的 Apportion 分摊，分派.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... laborious 费力的，吃力的 vainglorious 自负的，虚荣心强的 censorious 吹毛求疵的，苛求的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... laborious 费力的，吃力的 vainglorious 自负的，虚荣心强的 censorious 吹毛求疵的，苛求的.
心虚的英汉词典搜索结果，点击看详细翻译解释 ...  vainglorious1. 非常自负的 vainglory1.  自负；自高自大.

list.abs: for example , fasts and vigils , prayer and psalmody , almsgiving and hospitality are noble in themselves , but when they are done out of vainglory they are no longer noble .禁食、守夜、祈祷、唱诵圣歌、布施、款待客人…等，都是高贵的行为，然而，如果这些美德是出于虚荣心，就一点价值也没有了。

once upon a time Wu Zhuang was a vainglorious girl . once she achieved the Tao , she gave up her demerit of coquettishness and paid no attention to her appearance anymore .从前无庄是一位爱慕虚荣的女子，一旦得道她就忘记了自己搔首弄姿的老毛病，不再那么重视外表。
She is a vainglorious woman ., 她是个爱虚荣的女性.
the grand and vainglorious forces running The Great American Scandal Machine are big on how things seem .使“美国巨型丑闻制造机”运转的宏大而又虚荣的力量，对事情看起来是什么情况影响很大。

entry.tran: 非常自负的;自命不凡的
entry.def: If you describe someone as vainglorious, you are critical of them because they are very proud of what they have done and boast a lot about it.

auth_sentence.content: They even have a vainglorious name for the practice.

auth_sentence.content: Leonardo and other scholars revived this vainglorious notion during the Italian Renaissance.

auth_sentence.content: He was vainglorious in his triumph.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was vainglorious in his triumph.
